name: BounceFire
tag_list: web-development, drupal, entrepreneurs, small-business, search-engine-optimization, internet-marketing, email-marketing, strategy
overview:
Our goal is simple: create value-added websites for entrepreneurial businesses.

We provide web strategy, web development, creative and internet marketing services. Developing an online presence may seem lengthy and complicated, but simplicity is our focus.

We provide a turn-key solution to get the job done with our five step strategic process: Discover, Build, Deliver, Optimize and Innovate. Itâ€™s our way of cutting the bull â€” no time-consuming proposals, no confusing questions that do not affect the business. We practice agile web development methodologies, so we are flexible throughout this process, keeping it simple and creating a collaborative work environment where progress is seen early and often.

Discover initiates the strategic process. Build sparks the site development, where we shape the user experience. Deliver involves ensuring that the hosting hardware and software infrastructure is positioned for a successful launch. Optimize brings the site to the top of search engine results. Innovate starts our strategic partnership with your company. We are not afraid of commitment, and believe in long-term value-added partnerships that scale with business growth.
